# NSLayoutManager.TextLayoutOrientation.vertical

**Case**

Lines render vertically, each line following the previous from right to left.

## Declaration

```swift
case vertical
```

## Constants

- **NSLayoutManager.TextLayoutOrientation.horizontal**: Lines render horizontally, each line following the previous from top to bottom.

items.description: Lines render horizontally, each line following the previous from top to bottom.
items.name: NSLayoutManager.TextLayoutOrientation.horizontal

title: NSLayoutManager.TextLayoutOrientation.vertical
